## SendableKumo.sendKUSD() method

Send KUSD tokens to an address.

**Signature:**

```typescript
sendKUSD(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentKumoTransaction<S, KumoReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of KUSD to send. |
